channel.title: JSON Tools - Free Online JSON Utilities
channel.description: Free online JSON tools: viewer, formatter, validator, converter, diff and more. All processing is done in your browser for maximum privacy.

item.title: JSON Viewer & Formatter - Visualize and Beautify JSON
item.description: Free online JSON viewer and formatter. Paste your JSON to visualize it as an interactive tree, format with syntax highlighting, search keys and values, and copy JSONPath expressions. Supports drag-and-drop file upload and multiple indent options.

item.title: JSON Validator - Check & Validate JSON Syntax
item.description: Free online JSON validator. Check if your JSON is valid, find syntax errors with precise line numbers, and get auto-fix suggestions. Instantly validate any JSON data with detailed error reports.

item.title: JSON Minifier - Compress & Minify JSON
item.description: Free online JSON minifier. Remove whitespace, comments, and unnecessary characters to reduce JSON file size. Compare original and minified sizes with compression ratio.

item.title: JSON Diff - Compare Two JSON Objects
item.description: Free online JSON diff tool. Compare two JSON objects side by side, find added, removed, and modified properties with color-coded visual diff output.

item.title: JSON to CSV Converter
item.description: Free online JSON to CSV converter. Convert JSON arrays and nested objects to CSV format. Supports automatic nested array detection and flat object conversion.

item.title: CSV to JSON Converter
item.description: Free online CSV to JSON converter. Transform CSV data into well-structured JSON arrays. Supports custom delimiters and header row detection.

item.title: JSON to XML Converter
item.description: Free online JSON to XML converter. Convert JSON data to well-formed XML with proper element nesting and attribute handling.

item.title: JSON to YAML Converter
item.description: Free online JSON to YAML converter. Transform JSON data into clean, human-readable YAML format for configuration files and data serialization.

item.title: JSON to TypeScript Converter
item.description: Free online JSON to TypeScript interface converter. Generate TypeScript type definitions from JSON data automatically. Supports nested objects and arrays.
